name: Reach for the Stars v2.0 [C64]
description:
This game was made in 3 hours for the Friday night game jam!

Controls:

Aim with the mouse and press space to jump in the direction the arrow is facing!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The limitation was only using the controls available for the Atari 2600 aka single button input and axis input (mouse or joystick)

This was a really fun jam to do, the theme/limitation was perfect for such a small time frame and I had a lot of fun doing it, can't wait for the next one! :D

Jam Link: https://itch.io/jam/friday-night-game-jam-2020-36
